Maze

You have finally been deemed worthy to enter the temple the Ark is located in! For your final quest you must make it throught the maze. In order to do this you must use the Bible verses given to us in the previous puzzles! They hold the key to naviagte the maze.

Joshua 6:1-21
Samuel 5:1-4
Exodus 25:17-19
Revelation 11:9

What color star reveals the Ark of The Covenant's location: Go to the Ark!
